name: Elena Rodriguez
story: I want to discover new galaxies and understand the secrets of black holes. The night sky feels like a giant puzzle waiting to be solved.

name: Marcus Chen
story: The ocean is full of amazing creatures. I want to swim with dolphins and help protect the coral reefs from pollution.

name: Aisha Jamil
story: There are so many important stories in the world that need to be told. I want to use my camera to give a voice to the voiceless and inspire change.

name: Leo Santos
story: I love building things, and I want to build real robots that can help people, like exploring other planets or assisting doctors in surgery.
